Beverly Afaglo Baah (amụrụ Ya na 28 Mee 1983) o bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eweputa ihe ngosi na onyonyo.
Beverly si na mpaghara Volta na Ghana
Ọ lụrụ Eugene Kwadwo Boadu Baah na obere nsogbu ma ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ.

Beverly nwetara ọzụzụ dị ka Beauty Therapist na FC Institute of Beauty Therapy, Ghana ma o bubu nwa akwụkwọ nke Ghana Institute of Journalism ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ na mmekọrịta ọha na eze. E wezụga ime ihe nkiri, ọ na-arụ ọrụ Glamour Beauty Salon na Tema.
